review: I Love the fire stick so much that I canceled my live tv programming.
author: Amy Buckingham

review: Does what is says. Great way to watch Amazon prime. Simple enough for older people.
author: William

review: Love my fire stick......I am a female senior citizen and hooked it up all by myself.  Amazon came through once again.
author: Marietta

review: Small compact I can take it anywhere and the picture quality is so clear and makes any tv a smart tv. I love it
author: Marcelo Guerrero

review: I bought this for 2nd tv and it has been great.  Interface isn't too bad and is almost identical to my roku.  The only thing I wish was included was a USB cord that can hook up to the back of the TV instead of using the regular power adapter.
author: BJ Labestre

review: OMG I love this thing. Now my old TV works like a smart tv! I highly recommend!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Have not had a lot of opportunity to use it but when I do I am very satisfied. I expect as the weather gets colder and fall sets in this will bea wonderful purchase.
author: Linda D. Seger

review: I love this thing. It's a lot better then going threw my PS4 and having it run hot. Great price. Get one if your  looking into something simple
author: Sampson Bell
